summary:
Adds 19 lore friendly staffs to the game.
Craftable at the staff enchanter table, each magic element have their own build tree.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][size=4][url=https://postimg.org/image/ytacu2ehd/][img]https://s32.postimg.org/hg02f7j6d/banner.jpg[/img][/url]

[center][color=#cc4125]Grand Staffs adds 19 lore friendly staffs to the game, six for each element (fire,frost & shock).
They are craftable at the staff enchanter table, each magic element have their own build tree.Â 

This means that staffs can be upgraded following a small tree, however, you must choose your options carefully because you will need unique items to build them, and it will destroy them in the process.
(this was intended to increase the roleplaying factor).
[/color][/center][/size][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#cc4125][size=4][b]ITEMS YOU WILL NEED TO CRAFT THE STAFFS[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4][b]

[/b][/size][/font][b][img]https://s32.postimg.org/qd27plbol/Ahzidal_Mask.png[/img][/b][b][img]https://s32.postimg.org/jm1fgnctx/Zahkriisos_Mask.png[/img][/b][b][img]https://s31.postimg.org/8y1eg2z23/Dukaan_Mask.png[/img][img]https://s31.postimg.org/ulpfnqbuj/Hearth_stone_1.png[/img][url=https://postimg.org/image/t8ptmip1j/][img]https://s31.postimg.org/pp3vwpmbv/Skyrim_Grand_soul_gem.png[/img][/url][/b]
[font=Times New Roman]
[size=4][color=#cc4125]Also, you will need some perks in order to craft them, the more powerfull the staff the more powerfull perks you will need.
Initially you will need a base staff with the spell of your choice.

Below it's the upgrade tree for fire staffs to give you an example, the tree apply to frost and shock elements as well.[/color]
[/size]
[/font][size=4][url=https://postimg.org/image/8btn5do35/][img]https://s32.postimg.org/nxaypc01h/grand_staffs_fire_tree_copia.jpg[/img][/url]
[font=Times New Roman][b]
[b][color=#cc4125]** UPDATE 10/13/2017: NEW FORMULA ADDED **
[/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125]- Staff of Burning Wrath
Skill Requirements: Destruction Adept, Augmented Flames perk (lvl 2), Enchanter lvl 3, Fire Enchanter.
[b][b][color=#cc4125] Material Requirements: Eye of Melka, Staff of Hag's Wrath, 10 Grand Soul Gems.[/color][/b][/b]
[/color][/b]
[color=#cc4125]REQUIREMENTS[/color][/b][color=#cc4125]
- Dragonborn DLC, or legendary edition.

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
- Put the .esp in the data folder, check it with the skyrim launcher.


[/color][/font][/size][color=#cc4125][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]COMPATIBILITY
[/size][/font][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod create new objects so it's completely clean, it doesn't modify anything, also it's scritpless, so that means it's safe to install in mid game.[/size][/font][/color]
author: ebene
